channel.title: Shilo-Village
channel.description:
This is a server I very loosely created based on a server I played by Runite. It's a 2006 server, with a very old school feeling but not just another remake. There will be unique ways I add content, certain items will have effects that may be different runescape. I wanted to make a game like this server because when I played it, I enjoyed the game-style. The theory behind this type of server is to keep it close knit, when you can free roam around runescape it makes it harder for the community to connect because it's so spread out. This being said I don't plan for the server to be limited to Shilo in any manner. I want to have just as much content if not more but by using only Islands off of runescape mainland and dungeons either in or out of runescape mainland, but many of these will be reachable by entrances or traveling from around Shilo village.
Background on me as a developer: I'm very ADD when I develop which is never necessarily a bad thing. I like to make sure things are added right and I rarely take the easy way out when adding content. I want my content to seem unique and if it takes some tedious work then by all means I'll do it.
Only unntrainable skills as of now Agility - system is put in place (thinking of unique course) Thieving - system added - need to add npcs and stalls in server Herblore - Herbs are dropped by many npcs but need to add potion making Farming
Current reachable places:
[ul][*]Shilo Village [*]Entrana [*]Brimhaven [*]Brimhaven Dungeon [*]Karamja Dungeon [*]Tzhaar Caves [*]Crandor [*]Ape Atoll [*]Shilo Dungeon[/ul]
Media: [SPOILER=Media]Woodcutting: \ [URL=http://"http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/Woodcutting_zpsce3244b9.png.html"][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Woodcutting_zpsce3244b9.png[/img][/URL]
Fletching: Full arrow fletching (Feather + Arrow shaft = Headless arrow + Arrowtip = arrow) [URL=http://"http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/Arrowmaking_zps803afaea.png.html"][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Arrowmaking_zps803afaea.png[/img][/URL]
Full log fletching to unstrung [URL=http://"http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/fletchlog_zpsa7373653.png.html"][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/fletchlog_zpsa7373653.png[/img][/URL]
Fully automatic stringing [URL=http://"http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/bowstringing_zps08aea093.png.html"][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/bowstringing_zps08aea093.png[/img][/URL]
Crafting: Tanning [URL=http://"http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/Tanninghides_zpsc4af7e71.png.html"][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Tanninghides_zpsc4af7e71.png[/img][/URL]
Hide crafting [URL=http://"http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/Craftinghides_zps1f2acda0.png.html"][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Craftinghides_zps1f2acda0.png[/img][/URL]
Flax picking [URL=http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/FLaxpicking_zps0547d498.png.html][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/FLaxpicking_zps0547d498.png[/img][/URL]

Cooking: [URL=http://"http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/Cookinginterface_zps1b7b145d.png.html"][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Cookinginterface_zps1b7b145d.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://"http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/Cooking_zpsa0275a0f.png.html"][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Cooking_zpsa0275a0f.png[/img][/URL]
Smithing: [URL=http://"http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/Smithing_zps1a718817.png.html"][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Smithing_zps1a718817.png[/img][/URL]
Fishing: Fully working with randoms [URL=http://"http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/Fishingrandom_zps1ca47554.png.html"][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Fishingrandom_zps1ca47554.png[/img][/URL]
Full slayer system: [URL=http://"http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/Fullslayersystem_zps812e4882.png.html"][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Fullslayersystem_zps812e4882.png[/img][/URL]
Tele to essence mines- part of runecrafting [URL=http://"http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/essence_zpsbb78736a.png.html"][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/essence_zpsbb78736a.png[/img][/URL]
Non-skill related Dungeon under Shilo: [URL=http://"http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/Dungeonundershilo_zps0ceac1c6.png.html"][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Dungeonundershilo_zps0ceac1c6.png[/img][/URL]
Small look at the dungeon [URL=http://"http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/Dungeonundershilolook_zpsa904d1e9.png.html"][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Dungeonundershilolook_zpsa904d1e9.png[/img][/URL]
Traveling to Brimhaven: Access to brimhaven dungeon and Karamja Island [URL=http://"http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/Travelingtobrim_zpsc10274b8.png.html"][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Travelingtobrim_zpsc10274b8.png[/img][/URL]
Traveling to Ape Atoll: [URL=http://"http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/Travelingtoapeatoll_zpsf902c61d.png.html"][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Travelingtoapeatoll_zpsf902c61d.png[/img][/URL]
Monkey guards on Ape Atoll that have small chance to drop dragon scimitar and also heal. [URL=http://"http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/Monkeyguard_zps1675eb2e.png.html"][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Monkeyguard_zps1675eb2e.png[/img][/URL]
Custom Quest that grants access to Entrana: [URL=http://"http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/Sailorquest_zpsd4e5e20c.png.html"][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Sailorquest_zpsd4e5e20c.png[/img][/URL]
Tribal Warrior Boss: Rare drop chance of Jungle Vine\also cooking gauntlets [URL=http://"http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/Tribalwarriorboss_zpsc0691708.png.html"][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Tribalwarriorboss_zpsc0691708.png[/img][/URL]
Staff List: Mostly meant to help players but also let's players know staff online in case assistance is direly needed. [URL=http://"http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/strverylow/media/Stafflist_zpsc46b41c6.png.html"][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Stafflist_zpsc46b41c6.png[/img][/URL][/SPOILER]
Please post feedback on what you think of the server thus far.
Will be releasing for alpha sometime next week but there will be a reset, alpha will be to help me see how the combat system is and help me test out skilling systems, as well as obviously look for any bugs that may exist.

item.description:

Don’t like it… especially since it’s based off PI…
[/quote]
lol shutup, you use allstar :palm:

@topic: props for keeping it old school, good luck[/quote]
So I only program Allstar sources now? Nice work going off topic bub.

Again, what updates are planned.

Read full topic

item.description:
@justinleeoglesby wrote:

This is a server I very loosely created based on a server I played by Runite. It’s a 2006 server, with a very old school feeling but not just another remake. There will be unique ways I add content, certain items will have effects that may be different runescape. I wanted to make a game like this server because when I played it, I enjoyed the game-style. The theory behind this type of server is to keep it close knit, when you can free roam around runescape it makes it harder for the community to connect because it’s so spread out. This being said I don’t plan for the server to be limited to Shilo in any manner. I want to have just as much content if not more but by using only Islands off of runescape mainland and dungeons either in or out of runescape mainland, but many of these will be reachable by entrances or traveling from around Shilo village.

Background on me as a developer: I’m very ADD when I develop which is never necessarily a bad thing. I like to make sure things are added right and I rarely take the easy way out when adding content. I want my content to seem unique and if it takes some tedious work then by all means I’ll do it.

Only unntrainable skills as of now
Agility - system is put in place (thinking of unique course)
Thieving - system added - need to add npcs and stalls in server
Herblore - Herbs are dropped by many npcs but need to add potion making
Farming

Current reachable places:

[ul][]Shilo Village
[]Entrana
[]Brimhaven
[]Brimhaven Dungeon
[]Karamja Dungeon
[]Tzhaar Caves
[]Crandor
[]Ape Atoll
